msg.msgText:
A "QueueManagerConnection" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create QueueManagerConnection help imaserver crete QueueManagerConnection "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create QueueManagerConnection "Name=QMConn1" "QueueManagerName=QM" "ConnectionName=127.0.0.1" "ChannelName=CHANNEL1"
Configuration items for "QueueManagerConnection" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
